fullplot: Based on a play inspired by a true story, The Visit explores one man's search for understanding and redemption. With the help of a psychiatrist, convicted rapist Alex Waters (Hill Harper) charts a new course that changes forever the fate of those who love him and their memories of him.
plot: A young man dying in prison brings his family together for a fateful visit, and proceeds to put his life back together.
title: The Visit

tomatoes.consensus: An earnest drama, The Visit gains much emotional power through its fine performances.
